description: If your Xbox needs some storage for new games, the 2TB Seagate Storage Expansion Card is still available with a massive discount. Read more...
title: Save 44% on 2TB Seagate Storage Expansion Card for Xbox

description: Microsoft has released a new Windows 11 Beta Build 22635.4655 under KB5048753 today for Insiders. It has some new features and bug fixes. Read more...
title: KB5048753: Windows 11 gets better Start menu filter, new Edge gaming assist, and more

description: The new Windows 11 Dev build is here, and it packs fresh webcam features, third-party passkey support, and other improvements. Read more...
title: Windows 11 build 26120.2702 is out in Dev Channel with new webcam features

description: In another blow to Google, the search giant has been fined $75 billion by Turkey's competition authority. The agency was investigating Google for leveraging its position in the ad server market. Read more...
title: Google fined $75 million for violating competition laws in Turkey

description: Manage your projects more efficiently with the right timelines, budgets. Project management has never been this easy. Price drop ends 12/22. Read more...
title: Microsoft Project 2021 Professional for Windows drops to lowest price

description: Microsoft has confirmed it is not lowering the system requirements of Windows 11 for running on unsupported hardware. Read more...
title: Microsoft confirms it's not lowering Windows 11 system requirements for unsupported hardware

description: BlueStacks has introduced BlueStacks Air, which brings Android games to macOS devices and is optimized for Apple's M1, M2, and newer chips. Read more...
title: BlueStacks Air brings an easy way to play Android games on macOS

description: More details about The Witcher IV are being teased by developer CD Projekt RED, including Geralt's role in the new trilogy, Ciri's first steps as a Witcher, and more. Read more...
title: Geralt will be in The Witcher IV, confirms CD Projekt RED, calls new entry an origin story

description: Meta has introduced its own watermarking tool for AI-generated videos called "Video Seal" meant to combat AI video manipulation. Read more...
title: Meta introduces 'Video Seal' watermarking tool for AI-generated videos

description: Intel has released a launch driver for the recently introduced Intel Arc B-series graphics cards under version 32.0.101.6325. Read more...
title: Intel releases new graphics driver with Arc B-series graphics card support

description: The 13-inch Apple iPad Pro with 256GB and 512GB storage and the M4 chip is currently selling at its lowest price. Read more...
title: 13-inch Apple iPad Pro is once again available at its lowest price

description: Netflix will make Squid Game: Unleashed free to play for non-subscribers for a limited time on December 17. Read more...
title: Netflix will make Squid Game: Unleashed free to play on December 17

description: As the deadline for the USB-C law in the EU comes into effect, Apple will stop selling the iPhone SE third-gen and iPhone 14 series in the region. Read more...
title: Apple will stop selling iPhone SE and iPhone 14 series in Europe starting next year

description: Be careful with the first preview versions of Recallâ€”it still captures a lot of sensitive data despite assurances it would not to do so. Read more...
title: Despite assurances, Windows 11's Recall still captures a lot of sensitive data

description: Linux Mint 22.1 Beta has defied naming conventions by going with the codename Xia instead of a name beginning with W. Read more...
title: Linux Mint 22.1 Beta breaks codename conventions, goes with Xia

description: Microsoft has released big firmware updates for its Copilot+ PCs. They fix numerous issues and bring many improvements. Read more...
title: Surface Pro 11 and Laptop 7 get big firmware update full of fixes and improvements

description: Helldivers 2 PC and PlayStation 5 players can now enjoy the new city landscapes, mow down zombified citizens, and joyride on the FRV vehicle. A limited-editio DualSense is coming soon too. Read more...
title: Helldivers 2 update out with new faction, drivable vehicle, urban environments, and more

description: Microsoft has already begun the removal of NTLM early as the feature is no longer available on Windows 11 24H2 and Server 2025. Read more...
title: Microsoft begins removing NTLM on Windows 11 24H2, Server 2025 already

description: Along with other awards including Best Game Direction, Best Family Game, and Best Action/Adventure Game, Astro Bot also won the 'Game of the Year' award at The Game Awards 2024. Read more...
title: Astro Bot clinches 'Game of the Year' award at The Game Awards 2024

description: Microsoft's new Phi-4 small language model outperforms OpenAI's GPT-4 and Google's Gemini 1.5 Pro in math-related AI benchmarks. Read more...
title: Microsoft introduces Phi-4, a 14B parameter state-of-the-art small language model

description: The Game Awards saw Josef Fares announcing Split Fiction, Hazelight's next split-screen game with another unique twist. Friend's Pass is returning for free access for the second player too. Read more...
title: Hazelight's new co-op game Split Fiction mashes together sci-fi and fantasy worlds

description: Next year, watching YouTube TV is going to get significantly expensive as YouTube has to keep up with the rising cost of content. Read more...
title: YouTube TV subscription to get costlier starting January 2025

description: Saber Interactive is making a brand-new Turok game. The third-person experience even has cooperative play. Read more...
title: Turok: Origins aims to deliver an "old-school experience with modern-day execution"

description: Quick Share on Windows v1.0.2034.4 is here, offering various bug fixes and a new option to change visibility settings from the tray icon. Read more...
title: Google rolls out new Quick Share for Windows update with various improvements

description: Samsung's Galaxy XR headset will be powered by the recently announced Android XR OS, and is codenamed 'Project Moohan'. Read more...
title: Samsung officially drops the first look at its Galaxy XR headset

description: Sloclap is moving on from the martial arts of Sifu to create an arcade-inspired soccer game where teams of five battle it out on the field. Read more...
title: Sifu developer announces Rematch, a soccer game offering 5v5 action with no rules

description: WhatsApp is rolling out a new update that introduces new calling features for both mobile and desktop, to make your holiday season merrier. Read more...
title: WhatsApp on desktop and mobile get selective group calling, video calling effects, and more

description: The next project of Uncharted and The Last of Us developer Naughty Dog has been unveiled to be Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet. Watch the first trailer here. Read more...
title: Naughty Dog's next game is Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet, a brand-new sci-fi IP

description: OpenAI is rolling out video, screen share, and image upload capabilities in Advanced Voice for ChatGPT mobile apps. Read more...
title: ChatGPT mobile apps now support video and screensharing in Advanced Voice mode

description: The official trailer for Mafia: The Old Country was unveiled at The Game Awards today, giving a look at the prequel world players are entering set in 1900s Sicily. Read more...
title: Mafia: The Old Country trailer shows off prequel setting and new protagonist, Enzo

description: The remaster of The Last of Us Part II that released on PlayStation 5 in early 2024 is finally coming to PC with new features and more. Read more...
title: The Last of Us Part II Remastered coming to PC in April, 2025

description: The Game Awards 2024 had the promised Borderlands 4 trailer, showing off gameplay, new villain, a new planet, and much more. Read more...
title: Gearbox unveils Borderlands 4, calls it the "biggest and most insane world we've ever made"

description: Dark Souls and Elden Ring developer FromSoftware has yet another game coming soon. In 2025, the cooperative-focused action title Elden Ring Nightreign will land across last and current-gen platforms. Read more...
title: FromSoftware unveils Elden Ring Nightreign, a co-op action spin-off coming in 2025

description: Obsidian Entertainment has yet another RPG coming out in 2025. Next to a release window reveal, The Outer Worlds 2's first gameplay trailer is now here too. Read more...
title: Obsidian's The Outer Worlds 2 is out in 2025, first gameplay trailer is here

description: Amazon is offering the 49-inch Samsung G9 OLED ultrawide monitors, the G95SC and the G95SD, at their lowest prices. Read more...
title: Samsung Odyssey G9 OLED ultrawide G95SC and G95SD curved monitors are both lowest priced

description: The Witcher IV officially announced at The Game Awards, showing off six minutes of the new trilogy players will be entering. Read more...
title: The Witcher IV officially unveiled at The Game Awards, shows Ciri in action
